author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the red pepper directly onto a gas flame and chargrill until black blisters form on all sides. Put into a plastic bag, seal well and leave for two minutes. Remove the pepper from the bag, peel and slice. Put the red pepper slices onto the griddled bread, add the chopped anchovies, pine nuts and sesame seeds. Serve.
